condition.title: Condition
condition.p: A glossgroup contains multiple glossentry, all the entries are referenced using glossref elements inside my map.
When I add an abbreviated-form linked to one of my glossentry (using keyref), the entry isn't resolved in the PDF output.

steps-informal.p: Check every glossentry has an id. Then, for each glossentry, declare a glossref element as following: <glossref href="concepts/glossary.dita#flowers.genus" print="yes" keys="genus"/>In case of bookmaps, the glossref elements should be declared in a separate ditamap.
